caption.title: Yearly average water balance produced by the BCM2, CNCM3 and MPEH5 GCMs for A1B (top row) and A2 (bottom row) scenarios in comparison with the baseline.
caption.p: A positive number (%) indicates an increase of available water, a negative number indicates a decrease. The ( μ 1/2) and β of the Gumbel distribution were determined for all basins using Eq 3. An increase or decrease in median streamflow compared to the baseline is displayed with a percentage in the box-plot, while an increase (+) or decrease (-) in variability ( β) is also shown in the box-plot.
